title: Lincolnshire
name: Tattershall Castle
content: In Tattershall (between Horncastle and Sleaford), is an early 15th century red brick-built castle by the then Lord Treasurer of England Ralph Cromwell. Is set in grounds which include original the original guardhouse, moats and the largest parish church in the country. Open every day except Wednesday from Marchâ€“October, open at weekends in November and December.
